questions.question: What makes Vitamiel honey unique?
questions.answer: Vitamiel honey is produced from unique floral sources across Spain, resulting in distinct flavors and qualities. We prioritize sustainable beekeeping practices to ensure the highest product quality and environmental responsibility.

questions.question: Where does Vitamiel honey come from?
questions.answer: Our honey is sourced directly from our own hives in Spain. Our bees gather nectar from specific floral regions, creating a variety of honey types that highlight the unique flavors of each area.

questions.question: How is Vitamiel honey packaged?
questions.answer: Vitamiel honey is packaged sustainably to preserve its freshness and protect the environment. Each jar is carefully sealed and labeled with information on its floral source and origin.

questions.question: How can I purchase Vitamiel honey?
questions.answer: You can purchase Vitamiel honey directly from our online store. We offer various types and sizes of honey, and we ship throughout Belgium.

questions.question: What types of honey does Vitamiel offer?
questions.answer: Vitamiel offers several types of honey from different floral sources, including wildflower, orange blossom, and thyme. Each type has a unique taste and nutritional profile.

questions.question: Does Vitamiel honey contain any additives or preservatives?
questions.answer: No, Vitamiel honey is 100% pure and natural, with no added preservatives, sugars, or artificial ingredients.

questions.question: Is Vitamiel honey organic?
questions.answer: Our honey is produced using sustainable and environmentally friendly practices. While we aren’t certified organic, we prioritize natural methods and avoid harmful chemicals in our beekeeping process.

questions.question: How should I store Vitamiel honey?
questions.answer: Store Vitamiel honey at room temperature in a dry place. Honey naturally resists spoiling, so refrigeration isn’t necessary. If it crystallizes, place the jar in warm water to liquefy it again.

questions.question: Does Vitamiel offer bulk or wholesale orders?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide options for bulk and wholesale orders. Please contact us for more details and pricing for larger quantities.

questions.question: How does Vitamiel support sustainable beekeeping?
questions.answer: Vitamiel focuses on eco-friendly practices, maintaining bee health, and supporting biodiversity. We avoid harmful pesticides and work to create a healthy environment for our bees.

questions.question: Can I track my Vitamiel order?
questions.answer: Yes, after placing an order, you’ll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to check the status of your shipment.

questions.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged product?
questions.answer: If your product arrives damaged, please contact our customer service team immediately with photos of the damaged item. We’ll arrange for a replacement or refund as needed.
